title: America's capital city in the crosshairs of GOP leadership
shortDescription: Trump wants the city cleaned up. Congress is holding $1 billion in DC taxes in limbo. Residents just want a say.

title: Democrats target House Republicans from swing states, red districts
shortDescription: Democrats hope to flip the House by capitalizing on their base's frustration with President Donald Trump.

title: China vows to 'fight to the end' after Trump's 104% tariff warning
shortDescription: Tensions between the world's two major powers rose after President Donald Trump threatened China with additional tax levies that would add up to 104%.

title: Trump administration fires admiral in ongoing purge of senior brass
shortDescription: Defense secretary Pete Hegseth has derided diversity efforts and has fired senior officers linked to them.

title: 'I love that': Trump on sending American prisoners to El Salvador
shortDescription: Trump told reporters he would be in favor of sending American prisoners to El Salvador Sunday but that he doesn't "know what the law says on that."

title: Trump can resume deportations under Alien Enemies Act, Supreme Court says
shortDescription: The Trump administration argued the law gives presidents "near-blanket authority" to detain and deport any noncitizen from a country at war with the U.S.

title: Immigration judge frees Trump voter's detained wife
shortDescription: Bradley Bartell and Camila Munoz have been reunited after she spent 49 days in ICE detention.

title: 'A very bad day': Trump threatens Iran if talks don't go well
shortDescription: Trump said U.S. officials will meet directly with Iranian leaders on Saturday.

title: Trump says he won't pause tariffs but is open to negotiations
shortDescription: President Trump said Monday heâ€™s not considering pausing his sweeping tariffs but is willing to negotiate with other countries.

title: Trump nuke nominee hit over qualifications, China
shortDescription: Brandon Williams, Trump's nominee to head the National Nuclear Security Administration, faces scrutiny ahead of his confirmation hearing.

title: Americans sour on Trump, the economy and tariff trade war
shortDescription: Multiple recent polls show the president's favorability slipping below 50%. Many voters say they disagree with his aggressive tariff plan.

title: Trump threatens to slap additional 50% tariff on China
shortDescription: While Trump threatened China for its retaliatory tariffs, he also signaled he's open to negotiating to tariffs on imports from other countries.

title: Artist pushes back against claims she 'distorted' Trump's portrait
shortDescription: Artist Sarah A. Boardman has responded to Trump's comments about his since-removed Colorado portrait, saying his comments damaged her business.

title: Trump welcomes World Series champions LA Dodgers to White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump welcomed the 2024 World Series Champion, the Los Angeles Dodgers, to the White House in Washington, D.C., on April 7, 2025.

title: House Republicans reach agreement over proxy voting for new parents
shortDescription: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna said Sunday that she reached an agreement with House Speaker Mike Johnson over her push to allow new parents to vote by proxy.

title: Trump trade adviser dismisses Elon Musk after tariff comments
shortDescription: "He's a car person," said Trump's top trade adviser about Elon Musk. "That's what he does, and he wants the cheap foreign parts."

title: Trump's tariffs could derail TikTok deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he would be open to negotiating on Chinese tariffs if they agree to the TikTok deal.

title: Podcasts, f-bombs and Elon Musk: Dems try various messaging strategies
shortDescription: Democrats are looking everywhere for their missing mojo as progressives demand they turn up the volume and fight back against Trump 2.0

title: 'Not what we voted for': Tariffs expose cracks in Trump coalition
shortDescription: Elon Musk, Bill Ackman, Joe Rogan and Dave Portnoy have all sounded off in the Trump tariff debate.

title: Trump wants trading partners' input on great deals, Hassett says
shortDescription: White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett downplayed concerns over President Donald Trump's tariffs, saying Trump will listen to proposals for deals.
